pages.title: Regrowth!
pages.text: Finally, using Bone Meal, you can now put any plant onto a frame or illusion block. And they will also grow! You can now put wheat seeds onto stone blocks, and they will grow, but slower than on tilled dirt. Who asked for it? I don't know, but here it is!

However, the prerequisite for this is that the frame or illusion block has already been "filled" with a block and imitates it. You cannot make an empty frame sustainable. This feature is supported by all frame and illusion blocks with a sturdy top face (i.e. slabs on the top half, upside-down stairs, closed trapdoors). $(l)$(#f00)The Bone Meal item will be consumed in the action!$()
